type.name: org.gradle.api.logging.configuration.LoggingConfiguration
type.description: A LoggingConfiguration defines the logging settings for a Gradle build.

method.name: getConsoleOutput
method.description: Returns the style of logging output that should be written to the console. Defaults to ConsoleOutput#Auto

method.name: getLogLevel
method.description: Returns the minimum logging level to use. All log messages with a lower log level are ignored. Defaults to LogLevel#LIFECYCLE.

method.name: getShowStacktrace
method.description: Returns the detail that should be included in stacktraces. Defaults to ShowStacktrace#INTERNAL_EXCEPTIONS.

method.name: setConsoleOutput
method.description: Specifies the style of logging output that should be written to the console.

method.name: setLogLevel
method.description: Specifies the minimum logging level to use. All log messages with a lower log level are ignored.

method.name: setShowStacktrace
method.description: Sets the detail that should be included in stacktraces.

property.name: consoleOutput
property.description: Returns the style of logging output that should be written to the console. Defaults to ConsoleOutput#Auto

property.name: logLevel
property.description: Returns the minimum logging level to use. All log messages with a lower log level are ignored. Defaults to LogLevel#LIFECYCLE.

property.name: showStacktrace
property.description: Returns the detail that should be included in stacktraces. Defaults to ShowStacktrace#INTERNAL_EXCEPTIONS.
